br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.scripts

Class CardAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.scripts.CardAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultAction, DefaultActionModel, EletricCurrent1Action, HackingAction, MineralogyAction, RecoveryAction

    public abstract class CardAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    Class for implementing the actions/effects for each card. A CardAction object can only exist in the local memory, unable to go under serialization.
